@nimodium:

You have probably clicked 'no' when uTorrent asked 'The uTorrent client has asked permission to uTorrent' (or something like that) and made uTorrent remember the answer. Best to turn off or uninstall Google Desktop's indexing feature.

@lac_1508

People that have this problem: It crashes at the start screen, the box with dragon age 2 and the tribal sowrd on it.

I had this aswell, but i have found a way to fix it!
Go to your install folder off your dragon age 2, in my case 

C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\Dragon Age 2\bin_ship

open up dragonage2config, go to video, render AND IT PROBABLY SAYS (directx11 if avaible), change it to dx9! bam it works thank me by sending me a pm :D 

Make sure you go to the tab above and click save settings( i dont know if he saves automaticly)
